task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully perform subtraction operation, you must know about the concept of subtraction.
taskbody.result: The multiplication result is displayed on the screen.
taskbody.example:
You want to multiply 2 and 5. The equation will look like 5x2=10. You enter 5. Press (x). Enter 2. Press (=)
The result 10 appears on the screen.
